text: Miriam Jacqueline Stevenson (born July 4, 1933) is an American television host and beauty queen. She was born in Winnsboro, South Carolina. Stevenson won the Miss USA pageant as Miss South Carolina USA in 1954. She was the first Miss USA to hold the Miss Universe crown. She was crowned by Miss Universe 1953, Christiane Martel of France. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Miss Universe winners Category:Models from South Carolina Category:American television presenters Category:People from South Carolina Category:Miss USA
title: Miriam Stevenson
